full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Strategic Framework for Public Health Measures Guidance

### Tender Description
The Public Health Agency of Canada is requesting proposals from qualified contractors to develop a comprehensive framework for public health measures guidance. The framework will be used to guide the future activities of the Public Health Measures Guidance Division, which is responsible for providing public health measures guidance to prevent or reduce the transmission of respiratory infectious diseases.

### Key Project Details

* **Project Duration**: The proposed estimated period of the contract will be from the date of contract award to June 30, 2023, inclusive. The contract also includes an option to extend the contract term by two additional one-month periods.
* **Scope of Work**: The successful contractor will be responsible for producing a comprehensive framework, in consultation with subject matter experts from the Public Health Measures Guidance Division, that will guide the future activities of the division.
* **Invitation to Bid**: This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-16TSSB who qualified for the Business Consulting/Change Management Services stream.

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Kashish Dhir
* **Phone**: 613-296-3297
* **Email**: [Kashish.dhir@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:Kashish.dhir@hc-sc.gc.ca)

### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this project have not been specified.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Region of Opportunity
This tender is open to contractors based in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this project is Health Canada, located in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.
